name.info: A short name for this Factor.  Factor is a particular aspect of a Situation that is being considered.
name.label: Factor Name

errors.minLength: Factor Name must be at least 5 characters long

category.info: Please enter the Category for your feedback
category.label: Category

errors.minLength: Comment must be at least 3 characters long
Comment must be at least 3 characters long
Username must be at least 5 characters long
errors.username: Username can only have A-Z a-z 0-9 - _ in it

errors.minLength: Password must be at least 12 characters long
errors.password: Password must have at least one of A-Z, a-z, 0-9, !@#$%^&*

errors.minLength: Password must be at least 12 characters long
Username must be at least 3 characters long

birthMonth.info: Please enter your month of birth
birthMonth.label: Month of Birth

search.info: Search for Situations or use the filter in the top-right menu
search.label: Find Situations

theme.info: Pick a Category to focus your results
theme.label: Pick a Category

name.info: Select the name for this Situation
name.label: Situation Name

errors.minLength: Situation Name must be at least 3 characters long

factors.info: Select the Factors of the Situation

labels.info: Select matching Tag(s) for this Situation
labels.label: Tag(s)

locations.info: Select the location(s) of the Situation (Continent(s), Country(ies), State(s), City(ies))

timeframe.info: Select the Start and End dates for the Situation

theme.info: Select the defining Category of this Situation
theme.label: Category

A.info: What is the Outcome of this Situation in case A.
A.label: Outcome A

errors.minLength: Outcome A must be at least 5 characters long

B.info: What is the Outcome of the Situation in case B.
B.label: Outcome B

errors.minLength: Outcome B must be at least 5 characters long

labels.info: Select matching Tag(s) for this Situation
labels.label: Tag(s)

cities.info: Select one or more Cities to which this Situation will apply
cities.label: City(ies)

continents.info: Select one or more Continents to which this Situation will apply
continents.label: Continent(s)

countries.info: Select one or more Countries to which this Situation will apply
countries.label: Country(ies)

states.info: Select one or more States to which this Situation will apply
states.label: State(s)

A.info: The Position for Outcome A for this Factor.
A.label: Position A

errors.minLength: Position A must be at least 5 characters long

B.info: The Position for Outcome B for this Factor.
B.label: Position B

errors.minLength: Position B must be at least 5 characters long

startDate.info: Select the date when solving this Situation starts
startDate.label: Start Date

errors.min: Start Date must be greater than today

endDate.info: Select the last date when this Situation open for Solutions
endDate.label: End Date

errors.min: End Date must be greater than today
errors.greaterThanOrEquals: End Date must be on or after Start Date
